original: Tu devi accettare il tuo ruolo.

translated: Tom only went to Mary's house to work on some homework together, but as a storm was raging outside his parents decided to let him spend the night there.

original: So che Tom non è colpevole.

original: Leggo il libro nella sua interezza.

translated: You're a good influence on him.

original: Mi aiuteresti a lavare i piatti?

original: Tom non deve tornare a scuola.
translated: Tom doesn't have to go back to school.

translated: The movie Tom was watching wasn't in French.

translated: Tom and Mary are quite creative, aren't they?

original: Ha promesso che non glielo avrebbe detto.
translated: She promised she wouldn't tell him.

original: Perché Tom l'ha dato a Mary?

original: Tom mi ha detto di non preoccuparmi.

translated: I spent no more than three dollars.

translated: I was here all day yesterday.

translated: Tom could tell by Mary's accent that she was probably from Ireland.

original: Perché non è riuscita a venire lunedì?
translated: Why couldn't you come on Monday?

original: Questo alimento contiene tutti i minerali senza i quali il nostro corpo non funzionerebbe.
translated: This food contains all the minerals without which our bodies would not function.

translated: I think I'll be able to help you.

original: Aspetta finché non ho finito di mangiare.

original: Tom scrive una tesi di scienze.
translated: Tom is doing graduate work in science.

original: La casa è rimasta chiusa da allora.
translated: The house remained closed ever since.

original: Io voglio soltanto che mi amino.

translated: Tom said he was a little tired.

original: Tom probabilmente dirà a Mary di guardare fuori dalla finestra.
